Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Exhaust gas temperature margin reduction. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel Injection component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 21/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
